line_1: And as it flits, and my fond soul bereaves,
line_2: But ah! the shade my empty grasp deceives;

line_1: — Ah! blest the hind, whom no sad thought bereaves
line_2: Feed the green ear, and nurse the future sheaves!

line_1: And of one arm the tott'ring trunk bereaves.
line_2: Sheer from the shoulder to the waist he cleaves,
